section.p:
The captain rewards you with the contents of his hold:
2 Cargo Units of metals . Note these on your Ship’s Manifest, assuming you have the space to load them aboard. (You can jettison your current cargo to make room, if you wish.)
‘What will you do now?’ you ask the captain.
He gives a quick bray of exhausted laughter. ‘Get my ship into port, sell her, and use the money to buy a tavern. I’ll never put to sea again, that’s for sure.’
